name: All of Control Game Jam
description:
Lose Control - By having too much control

Controls:

W:  ↑   S:  ↓ A:  ←   D:  →

Mouse: Select object/enemy/astronaut

Gameplay: 

In All of Control you quite literally take control of a stranded astronaut and enemies... and walls, and traps and portals?! Wait.. what is going on here? You have control over EVERYTHING!

Sound's awesome right? Just what every gamer wanted. But in good old space physics style it does not stop there, oh no. Once an object is in motion it can't be stopped unless you give it a counter motion.

Objects that fly out of the screen enter it on the other side, just like in Snake. But one thing not: the astronaut. He does not survive the cold, harsh loneliness of space, so as soon as he flies out of the station he comes back as a skeleton and your mission to save him failed.

Oh and a fair warning: the astronaut does not stop moving either, so be careful what you touch!
